creditline: Gifts of funds from Bruce B. Dayton and Mary and Bob Mersky
medium: Fabric and laces on wire with stitching and bindings
text: An organically shaped wall mounted sculpture with intertwined branches resembling intestines and other bodily organs. The interwoven branches range in size and width, forming a bulbous and biomorphic cage connected by one large central branch. The branches are wrapped with cloth and threads, creating a multicolor patchwork design of blue, yellow, red, white, and black.
title: The Ninth, from Torções series
